recipesJson.name: Chubby Bubble Blue Razz Remix
recipesJson.author: Sublimeice
recipesJson.description:
Current version replaces all others below. Think it is almost perfect.

INW Raspberry - This adds the tart, almost saltiness that chubby bubble blue raspberry has.
CAP Bubble gum - this adds a slight bubblegum base without overpowering the mix. I get a slight slight bubblegum from chubby bubbles mix, but its very light. This fits the bill perfectly.
FW & FW Blue Raspberry - LB's blue raspberry on its own is really good, but FW's adds a bit more tarty blue to the mix.


**Old Versions below.**
**these versions were close, but just didnt have the right blue raspberry tang to them that chubby bubbles has, and some where to strong on the bubblegum. Actually dropped the bubble gum down a lot to just retain the texture of it.**

Blue razzy goodness. - Pick which bubblegum you like best or that you have and enjoy!

**v1.0**

Blue Raspberry FW - 5%
Raspberry INW - 1%
Super Sweet CAP - 0.75%
Bubblegum Fruity TFA - 5%

Different version I've tried that work, but provide a slight variant in the bubblegum profile.

**v1.1**

Blue Raspberry FW - 5%
Raspberry INW - 1%
Super Sweet CAP - 0.75%
Bubblegum CAP - 5%

A bit lighter on the bubblegummyness mouthfeel, but still a solid flavor. Definitely worth a try if tfa's bubblegum is to thick texture wise for you.

**v1.2**

Blue Raspberry FW - 5%
Raspberry INW - 1%
Super Sweet CAP - 0.75%
Bubble Gum FLV - 1.75%

The bubblegum here is less fruity and more of a mouth feel with that slight fruitiness. **This version is better after 1 week of steeping.**

**v1.3**

Blue Raspberry FW - 5%
Raspberry FW - 1.25%
Super Sweet CAP - 0.75%
Bubblegum Fruity TFA - 5%

**v1.4**

Blueberry FW 2%
Raspberry INW 1%
Blue Raspberry FW 5%
Bubblegum Fruity TFA 5%
Super Sweet CAP 0.75%

If you want it super super blue mix this one.

Just a slightly different tartness from the raspberry FW. Its comparable to the original mix, but slightly less floral.
